compatibility.notes: MakeIndex license is permissive and allows for wide compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses that impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Maintain the integrity of the original copyright and permission notices.
Ensure that modified versions are covered by the same permission notice.
Distribute source code at a cost not greater than reasonable reproduction, shipping, and handling costs.
license.name: MakeIndex
obligations: Preserve copyright notice and permission notice in all copies.
Provide access to machine-readable source code when distributing executable forms.
Include a copy of the permission notice with any distributed executable forms.
Report modified versions back to the author.
